// Fatebringer (Timelost) (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer/Smallbore/Corkscrew + Accurised + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot
Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range
PvP “God Roll” Extended/Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=3250034553,3142289711,3038247973,47981717
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=1467527085,3142289711,3038247973,47981717


// Fatebringer (Timelost) (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=1840239774,106909392,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=1840239774,1087426260,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=839105230,106909392,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=839105230,1087426260,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=4090651448,106909392,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=4090651448,1087426260,3038247973,4104185692

// Fatebringer (Timelost) (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve

dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=1087426260,3418782618,3824105627


// Fatebringer (Timelost) (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=1840239774,3418782618,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=1840239774,3418782618,3824105627
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=839105230,3418782618,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=839105230,3418782618,3824105627
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=4090651448,3418782618,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=4090651448,3418782618,3824105627

Explosive + Frenzy

// Fatebringer (Timelost) (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve

// Fatebringer (Timelost) (pve,pvp)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
PvP: Hammer/Smallbore/Corkscrew + Accurized + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot
Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range
PvP “God Roll” Extended/Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve,pvp
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=3038247973,1015611457

Osmosis + AJ (?)

PvP: Hammer/Smallbore/Corkscrew + Accurized + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot

PvP “God Roll” Extended/Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster

Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks

// Hezen Vengeance (Timelost) (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Velocity Preferred) + Impact Casing/Alloy Casing/High Velocity Rounds + ALH/Overflow/Impulse Amplifier + Vorpal/Lasting Impression tags:god-pve

// Fatebringer (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer/Smallbore/Corkscrew + Accurised + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot
Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range
PvP “God Roll” Extended/Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=3250034553,3142289711,3038247973,47981717
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=1467527085,3142289711,3038247973,47981717


// Fatebringer (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=1840239774,1087426260,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=1840239774,106909392,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=839105230,1087426260,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=839105230,106909392,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=4090651448,1087426260,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=4090651448,106909392,3038247973,4104185692

// Fatebringer (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip
 tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=1840239774,1087426260,3038247973,11612903

// Fatebringer (pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer/Smallbore/Corkscrew + Accurised + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot
Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range
PvP “God Roll” Extended/Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW
 tags:pvp

// Fatebringer (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=1840239774,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=839105230,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=4090651448,3038247973,4104185692

// Fatebringer (pve,pvp)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
PvP: Hammer/Smallbore/Corkscrew + Accurized + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot
Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range
PvP “God Roll” Extended/Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve,pvp
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=3038247973,1015611457


// Fatebringer (pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer/Smallbore/Corkscrew + Accurised + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot
Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range
PvP “God Roll” Extended/Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW
 tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=3038247973,47981717


// Fatebringer (pvp)

dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=2946784966,47981717
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=2946784966,1015611457


// Fatebringer (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=3038247973,4104185692


// Fatebringer (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=3418782618,3824105627
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=3418782618,4104185692

// Fatebringer (pve,pvp)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
PvP: Hammer/Smallbore/Corkscrew + Accurized + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot
Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range
PvP “God Roll” Extended/Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve,pvp
